command.trade.timeout.comment: The duration a trade request lasts before timing out, in seconds.
command.trade.cooldown.comment: The minimum duration between a completed trade and issuing a new request, in seconds.
command.trade.cooldown-mode.comment: The mode for which player(s) get put on cooldown after completing a trade. Either WHO_INITIATED, or BOTH_USERS
text.trade.cannot_trade_self: You cannot request to trade with yourself!
text.trade.already_requested: There is already an ongoing request like this!
text.trade.trade_to_timeout: Your trade request to %s has timed out!
text.trade.trade_from_timeout: Trade request from %s has timed out!
gui.trade.title: Trading with %s
gui.trade.you_cancelled: You have cancelled the trade request!
text.trade.on_cooldown: You cannot make a trade request for %s more seconds!
text.trade.no_requests: You currently don't have any trade requests!
text.trade.cancel_specify: You currently have multiple active trade requests! Please specify which request to cancel.
text.trade.deny_specify: You currently have multiple active trade requests! Please specify whose request to deny.
text.trade.accept_specify: You currently have multiple active trade requests! Please specify whose request to accept.
text.trade.you_accept: You have accepted the trade request!
text.trade.you_requested:
You have requested to trade with %s
To cancel, type %s
This request will timeout in %s seconds.
text.trade.they_requested:
%s has requested to trade with you!
To accept, type %s
To deny, type%s
This request will timeout in %s seconds.
text.trade.must_be_player: Trade requests must come from a player!
